content: Yes, there are many contemporary artists who work in the style of realistic painting and have made significant contributions to the art form. In recent years, there has been a resurgence of interest in traditional techniques and subjects among both established and emerging artists. Some of the contemporary artists known for their realistic style include Alyssa Monks, Brian Tull, Elena Yushina, and Roberto Bernardi. These artists demonstrate a mastery of the techniques and concepts of realistic painting while also bringing their own unique perspectives and visions to their work.
